fractions.title: Create Printable Fractions Worksheet - Free Generator
fractions.description: Generate fractions worksheets for instant printing. Set operation type (add/subtract/multiply/divide), difficulty, and problem count. Grades 3-6.

geometry.title: Create Printable Geometry Worksheet - Free Generator
geometry.description: Generate geometry worksheets for instant printing. Area and perimeter problems for rectangles, triangles, and circles. Print now.

percentage.title: Create Printable Percentage Worksheet - Free Generator
percentage.description: Generate percentage worksheets for instant printing. Calculate percent of a number, find the whole, discount problems. Grade 6+.

decimals.title: Create Printable Decimals Worksheet - Free Generator
decimals.description: Generate decimal worksheets for instant printing. Addition, subtraction, and fraction conversion. Set precision and print now.

games.title: Interactive Math Games
games.description: Interactive math games for practicing arithmetic operations - addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

series.title: Create Printable Number Sequences Worksheet - Free Generator
series.description: Generate number sequence worksheets for instant printing. Pattern recognition and sequence completion. Set difficulty and print.

ratio.title: Create Printable Ratio & Proportion Worksheet - Free Generator
ratio.description: Generate ratio and proportion worksheets for instant printing. Find missing values, multiplicative relationships. Grade 6.

units.title: Create Printable Unit Conversion Worksheet - Free Generator
units.description: Generate unit conversion worksheets for instant printing. Length (m/cm), weight (kg/g), and time units. Select and print.

wordProblems.title: Create Printable Word Problems Worksheet - Free Generator
wordProblems.description: Generate word problem worksheets for instant printing. Shopping, distances, real-life scenarios. Choose topic and level.

worksheet.title: Create Printable Math Worksheet - Add Subtract Multiply Divide
worksheet.description: Generate math worksheets for instant printing. Set operation (add/subtract/multiply/divide), number range, and quantity. Free!
